definitions: the action of painting something, especially furniture or interior surfaces, in imitation of the grain of wood or marble

examples.text: the art of graining and marbling

shortDefinitions: action of painting furniture in imitation of grain of wood

definitions: coloring or marking that resembles wood or marble, especially as a decorative finish for furniture or interior surfaces

examples.text: matte and glossy surface graining creates a 3D effect

shortDefinitions: colouring that resembles wood or marble

definitions: the degradation of tires as a result of cool temperatures, which can warp the surface of the tire and affect its grip

examples.text: his tires had significant graining which hindered him in his fight for a strong result

shortDefinitions: degradation of racing tyres as result of cool temperatures
